name: peck
actor_no_arg: You peck at the air, emulating a chicken.
others_no_arg: $n begins pecking at the air like some kind of chicken.
actor_found_target: Risking a slap to the face, you give $N a peck on the cheek.
others_found: $n smiles and gives $N a chaste peck on the cheek.
target_found: $n pecks you on the cheek, how sweet!
actor_auto: I guess you scared them away...
others_auto: $n tries in vain to wrap $s lips around $s cheeks.
